mails.subject: Places in Italy
mails.content: I'm looking to move to Italy, but I have no idea what places will be the best for me and my family. I did some online searches, but the results didn't seem reliable or specific to my needs. Could you please help me out? Thanks!
mails.label: moving

mails.subject: Cupertino
mails.content: Brett, I'll be coming to Cupertino this December for the holidays. It would be great if you could show me around. I'll be there for one week. Thank you!
mails.label: travel

mails.subject: Insurance
mails.content: Hi Jessica! I hope you're doing well! This move has been pretty hectic, but with your help I was able to save a lot of time and money by switching my car insurance to SYKO
mails.label: moved

mails.subject: What a hot day
mails.content: Wow! I knew moving to India was going to be a vastly different experience, but this HEAT is treacherous. What do people do to stay cool around here? By the way, those tips you gave me about visiting Delhi helped BIG TIME! THANKS!
mails.label: misc

mails.subject: Oho!
mails.content: What's up, Brad? How is exotic India treating you? Did you get those project files that were pushed to GitHub last night?

mails.subject: Watch out!
mails.content: We've noticed that you're considering traveling to Haiti. Please be warned that there is an unreported scurvy outbreak in Haiti right now. You won't find information on it unless you really dig deep because media coverage is sparse. Please be cautious.
mails.label: work

mails.subject: HELP!
mails.content: So my travels in South America have come to a screeching halt! Our car broke down at a remote location in Chile and then we got robbed by some local thugs. Fortunately, I'm not injured and I only had a little bit of cash on me. We are now at a small city and I'm using a dialup connection to send you this email. Could you please help me find a safe hotel and a quick flight out of here?

mails.subject: What's up
mails.content: We've received your request for an agent and will have a live person contact you within 12 hours. Thank you for your patience.

mails.subject: Kick-off meeting at 5:00 pm
mails.content: Hey there! Sending you a quick reminder that we're meeting at 5pm to go over plans about our upcoming due diligence trip to Utah. Be ready!
mails.label: work
